title: TROHA-DIL logo
content:

comments.content: What you need to indetify type or something else

Hi Manlio-

It's Zubilo Black, by ParaType.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/zubilo-black/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303073158/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/zubilo-black/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/zubilo-black/")
